rukus.text: 84|1|Ten ga sake warete,
84|2|sono shu (no inochi) o kiki, shitagau toki,
84|3|daichi ga nobe hiroge rare,
84|4|sono Chu no mono o hakidashite sora ni nari,
84|5|sono shu (no o meirei) o kiki, shitagau toki.
84|6|O ningen yo, hontoni anata wa,-nushi no omoto e to roku shite doryoku suru mono. Kare ni au koto ni naru nodearu.
84|7|Sonotoki migite ni sono shosatsu o watasa reru mono ni tsuite wa,
84|8|kare no keisan wa sugu yoi ni seisan sa re,
84|9|kare-ra wa yorokonde, jibun no hitobito no moto ni kaerudearou.
84|10|Daga haigo ni shosatsu o watasa reru mono ni tsuite wa,
84|11|jikani shi o motomete sakebu nodaga,
84|12|moeru hono de yaka reyou.
84|13|Hontoni kare wa, jibun no hitobito no naka de kanraku shite ita.
84|14|Kare wa, hontoni (omo no moto ni) kaeru koto nado naidearou to omotte ita.
84|15|Iya,-nushi wa itsumo kare o mitoshite ora reru.
84|16|Watashi wa, rakujitsu no yubae ni yotte chikau.
84|17|Yoru to, soreni kaeri tsudou mono ni oite,
84|18|mata michitaru tsuki ni kakete (chikau).
84|19|Anata gata wa, kanarazu isso kara hoka-so ni noborudearou.
84|20|Soredemo, kare-ra ga shinjinai no wa do shita wake ka.
84|21|Kuruan ga, kare-ra ni Satoru 唱 Sa reru to, kare-ra wa sajida shiyou to wa shinai. 〔Sajida〕
84|22|iya, shinjinai mono wa,(sore o) usodearu to iu.
84|23|Daga arra wa, kare-ra no mune ni kakusu koto o jukuchi nasa reru.
84|24|Sorede anata wa, tsuretsuna chobatsu o kare-ra ni tsutae nasai.
84|25|Daga shinko shite zenko ni isoshimu mono wa betsudearu. Kare-ra ni wa taeru koto no nai hosho ga arou.
